items.title: At least 3 dead and thousands displaced as wildfires rage across southern Europe
items.description: Wildfires are raging across southern Europe, killing at least three people in Spain, Turkey and Albania

items.title: Zelenskyy says 'no sign' Putin wants to end war as Alaska summit edges closer
items.description: President Donald Trump's summit with Russian President Vladimir Putin in Alaska will be "a listening exercise," White House Press Secretary Karoline L...

items.title: National Guard troops now on DC streets told to maintain presence near National Mall
items.description: National Guard troops called on to active-duty by President Donald Trump arrived on the footsteps of the Washington Monument on Tuesday.

items.title: WATCH:  100-year-old World War II veteran flies same type of plane he flew in combat missions
items.description: David Muir shares the story of World War II veteran Joseph Peterburs and the moment he was cleared for takeoff at the controls of the same type of pla...

items.title: WATCH:  After rare manatee sighting in New England waters, scientists standing by for rescue
items.description: Scientists want to monitor its condition to see if a rescue is necessary before it succumbs to the cold water or lack of food.
